# Golemverse Game of Goose

Welcome to the Golemverse Game of Goose!

## Rules of the game

- Start with the idea 💡

- Role the dice 🎲

- Move your pawn ♟️

- If you end on a bridge: move to the next bridge 🌉

- If you end on a dice: play again  🎲

- If you end on the skull: start again 💀

- If you end on the well: skip one turn ䷯

- The game is finished when you reach the end user 👩‍💻
